attributes.action: Tax Exotic Pets - Owners of multiple exotic pets (ie lizards) to be annually taxed, proceeds to be given to owners of domestic pets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tax Exotic Pets - Owners of multiple exotic pets (ie lizards) to be annually taxed, proceeds to be given to owners of domestic pets. This will prevent irresponsible people owning exotic pets which they are incapable of looking after

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
